summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganNaturium's Vitamin C Complex Cleanser is formulated with two forms of Vitamin C, phytic acid and fruit enzymes, including papain and bromelain, that gently exfoliate to brighten skin. This gel cleanser works to dissolve makeup, oil, dirt, and impurities leaving skin clean, soft and refreshed.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply cleanses without stripping skinInstantly brightensGently exfoliatesDermatologist testedVegan, paraben & cruelty freeFeaturesTwo forms of Vitamin C:Ascorbic Acid - pure Vitamin CEthyl Ascorbic Acid - high purity stabilized form of Vitamin CPotent antioxidants:Phytic Acid - Naturally occurring acid found in plant sourcesPapain & Bromelain - Fruit enzymes work to gently dissolve dead skin cellsKey IngredientsTwo forms of Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid & Ethyl Ascorbic Acid): helps to provide antioxidant protection from environmental stressorsPhytic Acid: promotes gentle yet effective exfoliation, for healthier-looking skin and works to brighten uneven skin tonePapain & Bromelain: reveals brighter, more radiant skin, softens & smoothsOrange Fruit Water: refreshes and revitalizes, leaves skin feeling nourished, supple & cleansedItem 2627358How To UseApply a few pumps onto dry or damp skin and massage to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly. For a quick mask, leave on for five minutes before rinsing. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Citric Acid, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Decyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Glucose, Phytic Acid, Bromelain, Papain, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Glycolate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Water, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Sucrose Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Apply a few pumps onto dry or damp skin and massage to emulsify. Rinse thoroughly. For a quick mask, leave on for five minutes before rinsing. Wear SPF during the day. Patch test prior to use is advised.For external use only. Use only as directed.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I didn't notice a major change in my skin. I would consider continuing using it, however I just cant get around the smell of the cleanser. It has raw vegetable type of smell.

reviews.headline: Best Cleanser
reviews.comments: I use to use another face cleanser until i found "Naturium Vit C Complex Cleanse". This is the best product. I apply it every night to remove my makeup and it works better than any cleanser i have tried. I love how quickly this product removes my makeup with just one time. I plan to keep an extra bottle on hand.

reviews.headline: Okay-ish, but the smell …
reviews.comments: I just purchased tonight and gave it a try. I didn't notice anything special about the way it cleansed…. but this smell! Idk how to describe it other than it reminds me of a wet dog. I think I may have to return this one.

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I use Natrium Retinaldehyde daily and use this cleanser as a mask 3 times a week. Its gentle but so effective. Leaves my skin smooth with a nice healthy glow.

reviews.headline: Eeh
reviews.comments: Got this because a brand rep approached me and our conversation led me to try this out as an upgrade from my go-to. Personally, I have seen good results from my two holy grail face washes and this didnt give that. It made me realize I definitely need a gel cleanser vs cream or oil to clean my skin better. But other than that I won't be repurchasing when done. The smell is also off-putting.

reviews.headline: Product is fine, but the smell...
reviews.comments: I LOVED the Niacinamide gelee cleanser, so I wanted to try this one out. Overall, not a bad product, the only reason I wouldn't buy it again is the smell! It smells bad in my opinion. I'm still going to use it, but once it's empty, I'm buying the Niacinamide one again.

reviews.headline: Naturium vitamin C products are excellent
reviews.comments: I have tried all of Naturium's vitamin C products. I started with the body wash, to serum, now this face wash. All of them are hydrating and give me a glow. Affordable, clean, and works like the high end products.

reviews.headline: Good but…
reviews.comments: I want to love this cleanser but the smell makes me want to return it. Its not a fragrance type of smell. It smells badly like baby food. Perhaps I have a bad one? I love the brand overall but not this product.

reviews.headline: Andrea Nutrium Rep at Ulta Oceanside CA
reviews.comments: I had zero facial skin care routine until fabulous Andrea approached me at Ulta Oceanside CA Location. So patient and gave me a tailored crash course fully relevant to my body. I ended up purchasing 3 Nutrium products. Andrea is knowledgeable.

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: Definitely a skincare junky & try all different brands. This is a 1st for trying Nutrium. Was going for a La Roche Posay cleanser when I saw this so decided to give a try luckily with no regrets. Will buy again and also would like to try other Nutrium products as well.

media.headline: Experienced my softest, cleanest skin ever!
media.caption: My face wasn't fully dry and the luminosity was shining through.

media.headline: Experienced my softest, cleanest skin ever!
media.caption: My plump, dewy, brightened skin after one use!

faceoff_positive.comments: I am a skincare enthusiast and brand loyalist, having used some of my favorite skincare brands for decades. Naturium's Glow Getter caught my eye while searching for new bodywash and I haven't looked back. I put this vitamin C cleanser on dry skin, rubbed in and rinsed it off and wow! Not only was my skin SO clean, it was visibly brighter, without any drying effects. Here is a video of me using it, my skin looks like I have a filter on it, I don't. I washed my face for 60 secs and haven't touched my go-to brands since.
faceoff_positive.headline: Experienced my softest, cleanest skin ever!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this as a replacement for the Mixed Greens Nutrient Rich Cleanser (which has been sold out for months). After two weeks I am not seeing improvement in brightness, but it also doesn't seem to cleanse as well as previous Naturium cleansers. This is the first product I am disappointed in purchasing.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not as Good as Mixed Greens Cleanser
